locations: Ashland, Oregon, USA::(Rogue Valley Community Television)
imdb.plot outline: Host David "Glamour Dave" Nienow interviews the women of Cafe Girl Productions, Lia Dugal, Brittany Hreha, and Erin Rose about their work as women in Southern Oregon producing web series and films with the only all woman controlled film production company in Southern Oregon. The craft and art of film making in Southern Oregon is explored.
imdb.title: Rogue Artisans and Crafters: Lia Dugal, Brittany Hreha, Erin Rose
akas: Rogue Artisans and Crafters: Lia Dugal, Brittany Hreha, Erin Rose (United States)
